title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta until crispy and set aside.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain the pasta and quickly mix with the egg-cheese mixture off the heat.
Add pancetta, season with pepper, and serve immediately.
